<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Final Pass-Through Expense and IOP Payments</U>. &nbsp;The final payments to be made to SkyWest pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.02(b)(iii), above, shall be calculated as follows for the applicable month:</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:96px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(A)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:96px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">The Pass-Through Expense Payment will be equal to the aggregate amount of the Pass-Through Expenses reported in the Pass-Through Expense Report for such month.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:96px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(B)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:96px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">The IOP Payment, if any, will be determined in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.03(c), below.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(d)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Audit Right</U>. &nbsp;All reports submitted by SkyWest pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.02(a), above, shall be subject to audit by Midwest. &nbsp;SkyWest agrees to provide Midwest with any documentation reasonably requested by Midwest in connection with any such audit. &nbsp;Payment by Midwest of any amount to SkyWest pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.02(b), above, shall not constitute acceptance by Midwest of SkyWest&#146;s reports or affect Midwest&#146;s audit rights. &nbsp;Any amount disputed by Midwest may be offset against its next scheduled payment due to SkyWest. &nbsp;Disputed amounts must be paid promptly following the resolution of the dispute.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(e)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Payment Schedule</U>. &nbsp;Notwithstanding anything in this Agreement to the contrary, Midwest shall not be obligated to pay or reimburse any amount to SkyWest, pursuant to this Article V, or any other Section of this Agreement, including without limitation, Section&nbsp;3.02(c), until after deployment of the initial Aircraft pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.02(a).</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994777"></A><P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px"><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>19</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always"><B>5.03</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Block Hour and Cycle Rates; IOP Program Adjustment</U></B>. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Block Hour Rates</U>. &nbsp;The Block Hour Rate for 2007 for each Block Hour Cost Element will be as set forth on <U>Exhibit&nbsp;5.03(a)</U>. &nbsp;The 2007 Block Hour Rates will be increased by <B>[*]</B> each calendar year during the term of this Agreement.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Cycle Rates</U>. &nbsp;The Cycle Rate for 2007 for each Cycle Cost Element will be as set forth on <U>Exhibit&nbsp;5.03(b)</U>. &nbsp;The 2007 Cycle Rates will be increased by <B>[*]</B> each calendar year during the term of this Agreement.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(c)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>IOP Program Incident Adjustment</U>. &nbsp;If during any month during the term of this Agreement, SkyWest cancels one or more Scheduled Flights in connection with one or more IOP Program Incidents, Midwest shall pay to SkyWest an amount determined in accordance with the following formula:</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:32px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B>[*]</B></P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994778"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>5.04</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Fixed Costs</U></B>. &nbsp;The Fixed Cost Rate for 2007 for each Fixed Cost Element will be as set forth on <U>Exhibit&nbsp;5.04</U>. &nbsp;The 2007 Fixed Cost Rates will be increased by <B>[*]</B> each calendar year during the term of this Agreement, except for the Fixed Cost Rate for the Aircraft Ownership Fixed Cost Element, which shall remain at the 2007 Fixed Cost Rate throughout the term of this Agreement.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994779"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>5.05</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Fuel</U></B>. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Fuel Administration</U>. &nbsp;As soon as practicable, Midwest will provide to SkyWest the following fuel-related administrative services: &nbsp;(i) negotiation of fuel supply, fuel storage and into-plane service contracts for the Aircraft, (ii) payment of all into-plane and fuel invoices in respect of the Aircraft, (iii) monthly reconciliations (by the 22<SUP>nd</SUP> of the following month) with respect to fuel boarded, inventory and purchases, and (iv) monthly reports with respect to fuel boarded by station, flight number and Aircraft.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Outside Fuel</U>. &nbsp;To the extent that fuel is purchased by SkyWest outside of the contracts provided for in Section&nbsp;5.05(a) because of irregular operations or the unavailability of contract fuel at a Service City, SkyWest will (i) include the actual fuel cost paid by SkyWest on a Pass-Through Expense Report, and (ii) provide Midwest with a report of fuel boarded by station, flight number and Aircraft, along with fuel on board before fueling and at arrival for each affected flight.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(c)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Fuel Burn Limitation</U>. &nbsp;Midwest&#146;s obligation for payment for fuel, pursuant to Sections&nbsp;5.05(a) and (b) is limited to the Planned Fuel Burn Rate. &nbsp;Midwest will calculate the actual Fuel Burn Rate each month based on the information from Sections&nbsp;5.05(a) and (b), as well as the actual fuel price paid, inclusive of all taxes and into-plane fees, and net of any hedge benefit or detriment. &nbsp;The fuel burn guarantee assumes a stage length of <B>[*]</B>. &nbsp;To the extent that the actual Fuel Burn Rate exceeds the Planned Fuel Burn Rate for any month, then Midwest will calculate the Excess Fuel Cost as follows:</P>
<P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px"><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>20</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:96px; padding-right:96px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always"><B>[*]</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">Midwest will invoice SkyWest for the Excess Fuel Cost, if any, on a monthly basis, and deduct any Excess Fuel Cost from the next payment due to SkyWest pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.02(b).</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(d)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Audit Rights</U>. &nbsp;SkyWest shall have the right to audit on a semi-annual basis the determination of the number of gallons of aircraft fuel boarded and shall report any disputes to Midwest. &nbsp;Any dispute not reported to Midwest within <B>[*] </B>days of the conclusion of such audit shall be deemed waived. &nbsp;Midwest shall have the right to audit on a monthly basis the determination of the number of gallons of aircraft fuel boarded and fuel price paid and shall report any disputes to SkyWest. &nbsp;Any dispute not reported to SkyWest within <B>[*] </B>days of the conclusion of such audit shall be deemed waived.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(e)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>SkyWest Reporting Procedures</U>. &nbsp;To the extent that SkyWest is operating any SkyWest Service Cities, or its designee is operating any Contracted Service Cities, SkyWest or its contractor will comply with Midwest&#146;s fuel reporting procedures.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(f)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Fuel Burn Review</U>. &nbsp;At any time when Midwest publishes a schedule of Regional Airline Services that materially changes the average stage length of the Regional Airline Services, Midwest and SkyWest will agree on any required change to the Planned Fuel Burn Rate and the revised Planned Fuel Rate will be used thereafter until changed pursuant to this Section&nbsp;5.05(f).</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994780"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>5.06</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Pass-Through Expenses</U></B>. &nbsp;Midwest shall reimburse SkyWest, in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.02(b)(iii), above, for the actual amount of the Pass-Through Expenses specified on <U>Exhibit&nbsp;5.06</U> which are incurred by SkyWest in connection with its provision of the Regional Airline Services. &nbsp;Beginning with the month in which the initial Aircraft is deployed pursuant to Section 3.02(a), above, SkyWest shall prepare a monthly Pass-Through Expense Report pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.02(a)(iii), above, which such report shall include appropriate documentation for each Pass-Through Expense included thereon.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994781"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>5.07</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Billing</U></B>. &nbsp;Midwest and SkyWest shall bill each other on a monthly basis in respect of amounts owed to each other under this Agreement not contemplated under Sections&nbsp;5.02 and 5.08. &nbsp;If such billed items are not paid by a party within <B>[*] </B>days of the statement date, the aggregate amount of undisputed items may be offset against or included in the next scheduled wire transfer pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.02(b). &nbsp;Disputed amounts must be paid when the dispute is resolved, provided that such amount may be set off against or included in the next scheduled wire transfer pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.02(b) if the formerly disputed amount is not paid within seven (7) days of resolution. &nbsp;Midwest may also offset against the next scheduled wire transfer pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.02(b) the amount of any payment with respect to which SkyWest shall have defaulted and shall have fa
iled to cure before the expiration of any applicable grace period.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994782"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>5.08</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Performance Levels &#150; Incentives and Penalties</U></B>. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">SkyWest shall be subject to certain target performance levels and incentives or penalties as described in this Section&nbsp;5.08(a) (&#147;Performance Criteria&#148;). &nbsp;The performance of SkyWest during each Performance Period will be measured against each of the Performance Criteria. Any incentive or penalty associated with achievement against the Performance Criteria </P>
<P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px"><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>21</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always">shall be made in the next scheduled wire transfer pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.02(b)(i), either as an increment to the amount otherwise due and payable or as an offset thereto, as the case may be. &nbsp;Achievement of each criterion is independent of the others. &nbsp;The applicable Performance Criteria and associated targets, incentives and penalties shall be based on <B>[*]</B> for each Performance Period and calculated as follows:</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(i)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Completion Factor (calculated in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.10(a)):</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>[*]</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(ii)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">On-Time Factor (calculated in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.10(b)):</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>[*]</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(iii)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Mishandled Luggage Factor (calculated in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.10(c)):</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>[*]</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(iv)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Customer Complaints Factor (calculated in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.10(d)):</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>[*]</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(v)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Care Check Score (calculated in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.10(e)):</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>[*]</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(vi)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Customer Experience Pulse (calculated in accordance with Section&nbsp;2.10(f)):</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>[*]</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Calculations</U>. &nbsp;The parties agree that the Performance Criteria targets described in Section&nbsp;5.08(a), above, shall be calculated for each Performance Period during the term of this Agreement and shall be equal to <B>[*]</B> for each of the Performance Criteria for such Performance Period (&#147;<B>[*]</B>&#148;). &nbsp;After <B>[*]</B> for a Performance Period has been calculated for each of the Performance Criteria, Midwest shall calculate <B>[*]</B> for purposes of this Section&nbsp;5.08 and Section&nbsp;2.10, below, based on <B>[*]</B>. &nbsp;Within two (2) months after the end of each Performance Period, Midwest shall provide SkyWest with its calculations of (i) <B>[*]</B> for each of the Performance Criteria for such Performance Period, and (ii) the <B>[*]</B> required by this Section&nbsp;5.08 and Section&nbsp;2.10, below. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(c)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Reconciliation of Performance Standards</U>. &nbsp;Within thirty (30) days after the end of each Performance Period, (i)&nbsp;SkyWest shall determine the total number of actual flights operated by it during such Performance Period, (ii) SkyWest shall calculate its Completion Factor and On-Time Factor for such Performance Period, and (iii)&nbsp;Midwest shall determine SkyWest&#146;s incidences of mishandled luggage, its number of customer complaints, its Care Check score and </P>
<P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px"><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>22</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always">its Customer Experience Pulse score for such Performance Period. &nbsp;Within thirty (30) days after Midwest provides SkyWest with the calculations of <B>[*]</B> and related <B>[*]</B> pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.08(b), above, for such Performance Period, Midwest shall prepare and deliver to SkyWest (i)&nbsp;a reconciliation of SkyWest&#146;s actual performance to the targeted performance with respect to each of the Performance Criteria, and (ii)&nbsp; a written calculation of the resulting penalty and/or incentive payments payable by or to SkyWest for such Performance Period. &nbsp;Midwest and SkyWest will have the right to audit the determinations and calculations prepared by the other pursuant to this Section&nbsp;5.08 and shall report any discrepancies to the other. &nbsp;Any discrepancy not reported in writing within <B>[*] </B>days of the end of any Performance Period shall be deemed waived. &nb
sp;The payment in respect of any discrepancy shall be handled as a disputed amount in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.07.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(d)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Additional Performance Criteria</U>. &nbsp;During the term of this Agreement, Midwest may propose other performance criteria for SkyWest&#146;s operations pursuant to this Agreement. &nbsp;The parties agree that they will meet upon the introduction of additional performance levels for Midwest&#146;s operations to develop similar performance targets for SkyWest, taking into account the differences in operations between the two companies, and shall use their best commercially reasonable efforts to develop a system of performance levels and incentives/penalties for SkyWest&#146;s performance with respect thereto in a manner consistent with the performance standards agreed to herein.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994783"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>5.09</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Credit Card Chargebacks</U></B>. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">SkyWest shall be billed for credit card chargebacks resulting from SkyWest&#146;s noncompliance with Midwest&#146;s credit card acceptance procedures at any stations that are SkyWest Service Cities or Contracted Service Cities. &nbsp;Midwest shall apply the same card acceptance procedures and standards to SkyWest as applied to Midwest by Midwest&#146;s credit card contractors. &nbsp;Midwest will inform SkyWest in writing regarding any material changes in Midwest&#146;s agreements with its credit card contractors to the extent such changes will impact the procedures and standards to be applied by SkyWest.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">With respect to all credit card charge forms returned to SkyWest by Midwest, Midwest will furnish SkyWest with a complete written explanation of the reason therefor, accompanied by relevant documentation received from the credit card issuer or credit card holder.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(c)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Upon receipt of a chargeback, SkyWest shall have a reasonable period of time, but not to exceed thirty (30) days, to review the validity of the chargeback notice. &nbsp;If the chargeback is valid (within the scope of the circumstances for the chargeback), SkyWest shall remit to Midwest within thirty (30) days a gross amount equal to such credit card charge form. &nbsp;If, in SkyWest&#146;s good faith opinion, the chargeback is not valid, SkyWest will so notify Midwest and provide Midwest with a complete written explanation of the transaction together with any necessary supporting documentation within the thirty (30)-day period.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(d)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">All revisions to Midwest&#146;s credit card acceptance procedures must be in writing and must be submitted to SkyWest [*] days in advance of the effective date of such procedures or such shorter notification period as Midwest may utilize in notifying its own personnel.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994784"></A><P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px"><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>23</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always"><B>5.10</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Returned Checks</U></B>. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">SkyWest shall be billed pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.07, above, for all returned checks resulting from SkyWest&#146;s non-compliance with Midwest&#146;s check acceptance procedures.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">With respect to all returned checks, Midwest will furnish SkyWest with a complete written explanation of the reason therefor, accompanied by relevant documentation.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(c)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">SkyWest shall refund Midwest the full amount of the dishonored check within thirty (30) days. &nbsp;If, in SkyWest&#146;s reasonable opinion, the charge is not valid, SkyWest will so notify Midwest and provide Midwest with a complete written explanation of the transaction together with any necessary supporting documentation within the thirty (30)-day period.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(d)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">All revisions to Midwest&#146;s check acceptance procedures will be in writing and will be submitted to SkyWest <B>[*] </B>days in advance of the effective date of such procedures or such shorter notification period as Midwest may utilize in notifying its own personnel.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; font-size:16px" align=center><B>ARTICLE VI<BR>
<BR>
<A NAME="_Toc159994785"></A>REPORTING OBLIGATIONS,<BR>
AUDITING, INSPECTIONS AND CONFIDENTIALITY/PUBLICITY</B></P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994786"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>6.01</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Reporting Obligation</U></B>s. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Certain Notices to Midwest</U>. &nbsp;SkyWest shall provide Midwest the reports specified in Sections&nbsp;2.11(a), 5.02(a) and 5.05(b), above, and shall report to Midwest not later than the last day of each month its Completion and On-Time Factors for the previous month related to the Regional Airline Services provided hereunder. &nbsp;Upon the reasonable prior written request by Midwest, SkyWest shall make available its books and records related to its completion and on-time factors in connection with the Regional Airline Services provided hereunder.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><U>Certain Notices to SkyWest</U>. &nbsp;Midwest shall report to SkyWest not later than the last day of each month the number of incidences of mishandled luggage, the number of customer complaints, the Care Check score and the Customer Experience Pulse score for the previous month related to the Regional Airline Services provided hereunder. &nbsp;Upon the reasonable prior written request by SkyWest, Midwest shall make available its books and records related to incidences of mishandled luggage and customer complaints, and the Care Check and Customer Experience Pulse in connection with the Regional Airline Services provided hereunder.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994787"></A><P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px"><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>24</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always"><B>6.02</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Audits</U></B>. &nbsp;SkyWest shall maintain complete and accurate books and records to support and document all revenues, costs and expenses related to the Aircraft and the Regional Airline Services provided hereunder in accordance with GAAP. &nbsp;Midwest and any consultants engaged by Midwest shall be entitled, upon reasonable notice to SkyWest, to audit and inspect (a) tickets, air waybills, exchange orders, refunds and other records relating to sales and refund activity pertaining to the Regional Airline Services, and (b) all financial records related to the Regional Airline Services pertaining to the calculation of the Pass-Through Expenses.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994788"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>6.03</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Inspections</U></B>. &nbsp;Midwest shall be entitled to conduct on-site observations of SkyWest&#146;s in-flight service, flight, maintenance, customer service (training) processes that apply to the Regional Airlines Services, technical operations, gate check-in service, ground operations, aircraft cleaning and any and all other services and operations performed under this Agreement to monitor SkyWest&#146;s operations in the same manner as similar functions are evaluated at Midwest. &nbsp;The purpose of such inspections shall be to determine SkyWest&#146;s compliance with applicable Governmental Regulations, state and local laws, equipment manufacturer&#146;s instructions and the standards established by this Agreement. &nbsp;SkyWest&#146;s operations will be evaluated according to the same standard as Midwest taking into account the differences in size and operational capabilities between the two air
lines. &nbsp;Such inspections may be announced or unannounced, but under no circumstances shall they interfere with the operation of SkyWest&#146;s business. &nbsp;Midwest shall report the findings of any such inspection to SkyWest in writing. &nbsp;SkyWest shall provide a timely written response detailing a plan of corrective action to remedy any deficiencies noted in an inspection. &nbsp;If any deficiency comes to the attention of SkyWest through audits or any other means, SkyWest shall take immediate corrective action.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994789"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>6.04</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Confidentiality/Publicity</U></B>. &nbsp;Each of Midwest and SkyWest agrees that, except as otherwise required by Governmental Regulations or any other applicable law, it shall not disclose to others and shall keep confidential the terms of this Agreement and any confidential, non-public information concerning the other that it obtains as a result of or pursuant to this Agreement. &nbsp;SkyWest shall not issue any press release or public announcement relating to new Scheduled Flights, the cessation of Scheduled Flights in any Service City, schedule changes, customer initiatives, pricing or yield management programs, or marketing programs or promotions, without Midwest&#146;s prior written approval of the press release or public announcement. &nbsp;In any such press release or public announcement, SkyWest shall identify itself as a Midwest Connect Carrier.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; font-size:16px" align=center><B>ARTICLE VII<BR>
<BR>
<A NAME="_Toc159994790"></A>MIDWEST IDENTIFICATION</B></P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994791"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>7.01</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Identification License</U></B>. &nbsp;Midwest hereby grants to SkyWest a non-exclusive, non-transferable, non-sublicensable license to use the YX Identification in connection with its operation of the Regional Airline Services as authorized hereunder.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994792"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>7.02</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Designator License</U></B>. &nbsp;Midwest hereby grants to SkyWest a non-exclusive, non-transferable, non-sublicensable license to use the Designator in connection with its operation of the Scheduled Flights, Non-Scheduled Flights and Charter Flights as authorized hereunder.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994793"></A><P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px"><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>25</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always"><B>7.03</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>New Identifications</U></B>. &nbsp;From time to time in its sole discretion, Midwest may change any YX Identifications and/or Designators upon notice to SkyWest. &nbsp;After receipt of such notice, SkyWest shall, as soon as practicable, but no later than thirty (30) days thereafter, commence use solely of the new YX Identifications and/or Designators and cease all use of any superseded ones. &nbsp;Midwest shall reimburse SkyWest for the reasonable out-of-pocket expenses incurred by SkyWest in making such changes which are pre-approved in writing by Midwest.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994794"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>7.04</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Use of Identification</U></B>. &nbsp;The Midwest Group shall have exclusive control over the use and display of all YX Identifications and Designators, and SkyWest shall comply with all policies and guidelines of the Midwest Group in this regard. &nbsp;SkyWest shall use the YX Identifications and Designators in good faith, in a dignified manner and in compliance with good trademark practice. &nbsp;SkyWest shall use the YX Identifications and Designators exactly as prescribed by the Midwest Group, and shall not use (i) any stylization, abbreviation or variation thereof or (ii) the YX Identifications and Designators in connection or combination with any other Identification, in each case, without the Midwest Group&#146;s prior written consent, which may be withheld in its sole discretion.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994795"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>7.05</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Quality Control</U></B>. &nbsp;SkyWest shall use the YX Identifications and Designators only in connection with products and services that comply with the high standards of quality associated with Midwest. &nbsp;At Midwest&#146;s request, SkyWest shall submit representative samples to the Midwest Group of all uses by SkyWest of the YX Identifications and Designators pursuant to this Agreement, including Sections 2.02, 4.03(e), 4.06(d) and 4.08(f). &nbsp;SkyWest shall receive the prior written approval of the Midwest Group for any new uses of the YX Identifications and Designators, including on any advertising and promotional materials. &nbsp;Once such approval is received, SkyWest need not resubmit such materials for approval unless they contain non-trivial modifications.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994796"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>7.06</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Reservation of Rights</U></B>. &nbsp;All rights not expressly granted to SkyWest hereunder are expressly reserved by the Midwest Group, including without limitation the right to use or license others to use any YX Identifications or Designators. &nbsp;SkyWest shall not use the YX Identification or Designator except as expressly authorized herein, and has no right to use any other Identification of the Midwest Group other than the specific YX Identification in the exact form prescribed by the Midwest Group from time to time.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994797"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>7.07</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Ownership</U></B>. &nbsp;SkyWest hereby acknowledges that, as between the parties, Midwest, or an Affiliate of Midwest, including but not limited to YX Properties, LLC (hereinafter collectively, the &#147;Midwest Group&#148;) is the sole owner of the names &#147;Midwest,&#148; &#147;Midwest Airlines,&#148; and &#147;Midwest Connect,&#148; the initials &#147;YX,&#148; and any Designators or YX Identifications, and any and all trademarks, service marks, trade names or logos related thereto or otherwise licensed to SkyWest hereunder. &nbsp;SkyWest agrees not to directly or indirectly question attack, contest or impugn the validity and/or the Midwest Group&#146;s rights in the Designators and YX Identifications, including without limitation by attempting to register title to or any intellectual property rights in same or by participating in any action or proceeding adverse to the Midwest Group in this rega
rd. &nbsp;SkyWest agrees to cooperate fully with the Midwest Group in all actions to enforce, police and defend the Midwest Group&#146;s rights in the Designators and YX Identifications, subject to reimbursement for its pre-approved out-of-pocket expenses. &nbsp;SkyWest </P>
<P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px"><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>26</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always">shall execute any documents the Midwest Group considers necessary or appropriate to evidence or perfect the Midwest Group&#146;s entire and exclusive ownership of its intellectual property rights.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994798"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>7.08</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Termination</U></B>. &nbsp;Should this Agreement expire or terminate for any reason, the licenses in Sections 7.01 and 7.02 shall immediately terminate (although Sections 7.07 and 7.08 shall survive), and SkyWest shall promptly, but in any event within ninety (90) days (one hundred twenty (120) days with respect to any distinctive color scheme), take all such actions as may be necessary to change its facilities, equipment, uniforms, supplies and other materials to cease all use of any Designators and YX Identifications and to avoid any customer confusion or the suggestion or appearance that SkyWest continues to have an operating relationship with Midwest.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994799"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>7.09</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Bankruptcy</U></B>. &nbsp;The parties intend that the identity of SkyWest as the licensee hereunder is a material condition to Midwest&#146;s granting of the licenses in Sections 7.01 and 7.02, above, and that this Agreement should be construed overall as a contract for the personal services of SkyWest. &nbsp;Therefore, in the event SkyWest becomes subject to a bankruptcy proceeding, the parties intend that this Agreement shall not be assumed and/or assigned by SkyWest or its representative without the Midwest Group&#146;s consent.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; font-size:16px" align=center><B>ARTICLE VIII<BR>
<BR>
<A NAME="_Toc159994800"></A>TAXES AND FEES</B></P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994801"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>8.01</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Taxes and Fees</U></B>. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">SkyWest shall be liable for and pay the amount of any taxes (other than Ticket Taxes and Fees which are addressed separately in Section&nbsp;8.02, below), duties, license fees, assessments, and other charges, together with any interest and penalties thereon, levied, assessed, or imposed by any federal, foreign, state or local taxing or airport authority related or attributable to (i) the property owned or used by SkyWest, and (ii) the performance of Regional Airline Services pursuant to this Agreement.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Excluded from the coverage of Section&nbsp;8.01(a) are any taxes based on the net income of Midwest.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994802"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>8.02</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Ticket Taxes and Fees</U></B>. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">For all sales by SkyWest using Midwest ticket stock or air waybills, SkyWest shall be responsible for (i) collecting all Ticket Taxes and Fees, and (ii) remitting such Ticket Taxes and Fees to Midwest at the same time as the revenues to which the Ticket Taxes and Fees relate are received by Midwest; <U>provided</U>, <U>however</U>, that all Ticket Taxes and Fees shall be remitted to Midwest no less than three (3) business days prior to the date such Ticket Taxes and Fees must be remitted to the appropriate governmental entity. &nbsp;Midwest then shall be responsible for remitting to the appropriate governmental entities and taxing authorities Ticket Taxes and Fees remitted by SkyWest to Midwest.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">SkyWest shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Midwest and its current or former officers, directors, employees, agents, and its affiliates (the &#147;YX Indemnitees&#148;) from and </P>
<P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px"><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>27</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always">against all assessments or payments for Ticket Taxes and Fees related to all sales by SkyWest using Midwest ticket stock or air waybills, and any interest and/or penalties related thereto. &nbsp;This indemnification specifically includes, but is not limited to, assessments or payments under Sections 4261, 4263, 4271, 4291, 6662, 6672, 6861 or 7275 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, and any successor provisions. &nbsp;SkyWest further agrees as part of this indemnification to reimburse the YX Indemnitees for any reasonable out-of-pocket expenses, including attorneys&#146; fees and expenses, the YX Indemnitees have incurred in connection with any such assessment or payment. &nbsp;The obligations of SkyWest under this Section&nbsp;8.02(b) shall remain in effect and shall survive without limitation the termination of this Agreement.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994803"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>8.03</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Property Tax, Fuel Tax, and Sales and Use Tax Compliance</U></B>. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">With respect to fuel taxes, Midwest and SkyWest shall cooperate to ensure that SkyWest is filing appropriate fuel tax returns and refund claims to minimize SkyWest&#146;s taxes. &nbsp;Midwest shall determine which entity, Midwest or SkyWest, shall be responsible for preparing and filing appropriate fuel tax returns and refund claims. &nbsp;Unless Midwest determines otherwise and notifies SkyWest in writing, SkyWest shall be responsible for all SkyWest fuel tax filings and payments. Upon the request of Midwest, Midwest shall be entitled to review any actual or proposed SkyWest fuel tax filings. &nbsp;SkyWest shall notify Midwest of the commencement of any fuel tax audit. &nbsp;SkyWest shall receive approval from Midwest prior to resolving any fuel tax audit.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">With respect to sales and use taxes, Midwest and SkyWest shall cooperate to ensure that SkyWest is filing appropriate sales and use tax returns and refund claims to minimize SkyWest&#146;s taxes. &nbsp;Midwest shall determine which entity, Midwest or SkyWest, shall be responsible for preparing and filing appropriate sales and use tax returns and refund claims. &nbsp;Unless Midwest determines otherwise and notifies SkyWest in writing, SkyWest shall be responsible for all SkyWest sales and use tax filings and payments. &nbsp;Upon the request of Midwest, Midwest shall be entitled to review any actual or proposed SkyWest sales and use tax filings. SkyWest shall notify Midwest of the commencement of any sales or use tax audit. &nbsp;SkyWest shall receive approval from Midwest prior to resolving any sales or use tax audit.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(c)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">To the extent requested by Midwest, SkyWest shall cooperate with Midwest to minimize SkyWest&#146;s property, fuel, excise, sales, use, value-added, or similar transactional taxes. &nbsp;SkyWest shall in good faith and using reasonable best efforts supply Midwest with such information and documents reasonably requested by Midwest to minimize SkyWest&#146;s property, fuel, excise, sales, use, value-added, or similar transactional taxes. &nbsp;Unless Midwest determines otherwise, SkyWest shall use its reasonable best efforts to seek any and all applicable refunds or credits of excise, sales, use, value-added, or similar transactional taxes paid by SkyWest.</P>
<P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px" align=center><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>28</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always" align=center><B>ARTICLE IX<BR>
<BR>
<A NAME="_Toc159994804"></A>LIABILITY, INDEMNIFICATION AND INSURANCE</B></P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994805"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>9.01</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Independent Contractor</U></B>. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Except for the limited purposes described in Sections&nbsp;4.06(a) and 4.08(b), above, SkyWest is an independent contractor under this Agreement. &nbsp;The employees, agents and/or independent contractors of SkyWest engaged in performing any of the services SkyWest is obligated to perform pursuant to this Agreement shall be employees, agents and independent contractors of SkyWest for all purposes and under no circumstances shall employees, agents or independent contractors of SkyWest be deemed to be employees, agents or independent contractors of Midwest. &nbsp;Except for the limited purposes described in Sections&nbsp;4.06(a) and 4.08(b), above, in performing its obligations under this Agreement, SkyWest shall act, for all purposes, as an independent contractor and not as an agent for Midwest. &nbsp;Midwest shall have no supervisory power or control over any employees, agents or independent contractors enga
ged by SkyWest in connection with SkyWest&#146;s performance of its obligations hereunder, and all complaints or requested changes in procedure shall, in all events, be transmitted by Midwest to a designated representative of SkyWest. &nbsp;Nothing contained in this Agreement is intended to limit or condition SkyWest&#146;s control over its operations or the conduct of its business as an air carrier, and SkyWest assumes all risks of financial losses which may result from the operation of the air services to be provided by SkyWest hereunder.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Midwest is an independent contractor under this Agreement. &nbsp;The employees, agents and/or independent contractors of Midwest engaged in performing any of the services Midwest is to perform pursuant to this Agreement shall be employees, agents and independent contractors of Midwest for all purposes and under no circumstances shall employees, agents and independent contractors of Midwest be deemed to be employees, agents or independent contractors of SkyWest. &nbsp;In performing its obligations under this Agreement, Midwest shall act, for all purposes, as an independent contractor and not as an agent for SkyWest. &nbsp;SkyWest shall have no supervisory power or control over any employees, agents or independent contractors engaged by Midwest in connection with Midwest&#146;s performance of its obligations hereunder, and all complaints or requested changes in procedure shall, in all events, be transmitted by
 SkyWest to a designated representative of Midwest. &nbsp;Nothing contained in this Agreement is intended to limit or condition Midwest&#146;s control over its operations or the conduct of its business as an air carrier.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994806"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>9.02</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Indemnification</U></B>. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Each party assumes full responsibility for any and all liability to its own officers, employees and agents on account of injury or death resulting from or sustained in the performance of its respective services under this Agreement. &nbsp;Each party shall indemnify, defend, protect, save and hold harmless the other party, its officers, employees, and agents from and against any and all liabilities, claims, demands, suits, judgments, damages and losses (including the costs, fees and expenses in connection therewith and incident thereto) brought against the other party, its officers, employees or agents by or on behalf of any other person, by reason of damage to or destruction of property of any such person, or injury to or death of such </P>
<P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px"><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>29</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always">person, caused by or arising out of any act or omission by the indemnifying party occurring while this Agreement is in effect. &nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, neither party shall be liable for indemnifying the other for claims of third parties if caused by the negligence or willful misconduct of the other. &nbsp;Each party shall give the other party prompt and timely notice if it has actual knowledge of any claim made or suit instituted against the other party which in any way results in indemnification hereunder, and the other party shall have the right to compromise, or participate in the defense of, such claim or suit to the extent of its own interest.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Midwest shall indemnify SkyWest against any physical loss of or damage to the Aircraft caused by Midwest&#146;s negligent operation of ground support equipment or other acts or omissions of Midwest in performing Ground Handling Functions pursuant to Section&nbsp;4.02 above. &nbsp;For the avoidance of doubt, Midwest shall not be liable to SkyWest for any consequential loss or damage arising from physical loss of or damage to the Aircraft, and SkyWest shall not make any claim against Midwest and shall indemnify it against any liability in respect of any and all such consequential loss or damage howsoever arising.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(c)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">SkyWest shall hold Midwest harmless from and against any physical loss of or damage to the Aircraft, except as otherwise set forth in Section&nbsp;9.02(b), above.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(d)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">The obligations of SkyWest and Midwest under the indemnity and insurance provisions contained herein shall remain in effect and shall survive without limitation the termination of this Agreement with respect to any occurrence or claims arising during the term of or in connection with this Agreement.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994807"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>9.03</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Insurance</U></B>. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">SkyWest agrees, at its sole expense, to maintain in full force and effect during the term of this Agreement the following insurance coverage with respect to Regional Airline Services, subject to policy terms, conditions, limitations and exclusions which are standard in airline industry insurance policies:</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(i)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Workers&#146; compensation and occupational disease insurance, subject to the laws of the states wherein this Agreement is being performed. &nbsp;Such coverage shall include employers liability insurance with a minimum limit of $<B>[*]</B> per incident.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(ii)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Comprehensive aviation bodily injury and property damage liability insurance, with limits of not less than $<B>[*]</B> combined single limit per occurrence, including, but not limited to, aircraft liability, passenger legal liability, thirty party liability, liquor liability, premises, products (excluding manufacturer&#146;s products liability) and completed operations liabilities, premises and property damage liability, hangar keepers liability and baggage, mail and cargo liability. &nbsp;Such insurance shall include personal injury and contractual liability, and shall also include war risk and allied perils, hijack and confiscation coverage with a limit of not less than $<B>[*]</B> per incident. &nbsp;Upon written request from Midwest, SkyWest agrees to consider in good faith a request from Midwest to increase the insurance limits provided for in this clause (ii).</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(iii)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">All risk hull insurance on the Aircraft, including hull war risk and allied perils coverage, subject to SkyWest&#146;s participation in a government-sponsored war risk </P>
<P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px"><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>30</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always">program, or, if such a government-sponsored program no longer exists, a comparable commercial program.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Prior to the commencement of Regional Airline Services under this Agreement and at least annually thereafter, certificates of insurance in a form satisfactory to Midwest shall be delivered to Midwest evidencing compliance with the insurance terms of this Agreement. &nbsp;The certificates of insurance shall be of a type that unconditionally obligates the insurer to notify Midwest in writing <B>[*] </B>days (or such lesser period as may be available for war peril coverage) in advance of the effective date in the event of any adverse material change in or cancellation of such insurance. &nbsp;The policies of insurance required by paragraphs (ii) and (iii) of Section 9.03(a) shall provide coverage for events which occur during the policy period, are continuing in nature and not on a claims made basis, and shall include special provisions that provide:</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(i)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">that with respect to the interest of Midwest, the insurance shall not be invalidated by any breach of warranty by any other party;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(ii)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">that a waiver of subrogation is provided in favor of Midwest to the same extent SkyWest has waived its right of recovery under the terms of the agreement; and</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(iii)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">that any waiver of rights of subrogation against other parties by SkyWest will not affect the coverage provided with respect to Midwest.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; font-size:16px">The policies of insurance required by paragraph (ii) of Section 9.03(a) shall include special provisions that provide:</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(i)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">that the insurers acknowledge that the indemnification and hold harmless provisions of this Agreement are insured under SkyWest&#146;s blanket contractual liability coverage;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(ii)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">that Midwest, its officers, agents, employees, affiliates and assigns are named as additional insureds thereunder under the liability coverages, but only as respects the operations of SkyWest, as their interests may appear;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(iii)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">that the insurance is primary irrespective of any insurance carried by Midwest; and </P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(iv)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; padding-left:48px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">except for the limit of liability, the insurance shall operate in the same manner as if there were a separate policy covering each additional insured, but nothing herein shall operate to increase the insurer&#146;s liability as set forth elsewhere in the policy beyond the amount or amounts for which the insurer would have been liable if only one person of interest had been named as insured. &nbsp;The inclusion of more than one corporation, person, organization, firm or entity as insured under the policies shall not in any way affect the rights of any such corporation, person, organization, firm or entity either as respects any claim, demand, suit or judgment made, brought or recovered by or in favor of any other insured, or by or in favor of any employee of such other insured.</P>
<P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px" align=center><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>31</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always" align=center><B>ARTICLE X<BR>
<BR>
<A NAME="_Toc159994808"></A>TERM AND TERMINATION</B></P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994809"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>10.01</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Term</U></B>. &nbsp;This Agreement shall be effective as of the Effective Date and, unless earlier terminated as provided herein, shall continue in effect until June 30, 2012 (the &#147;Initial Term&#148;) and shall thereafter automatically be extended for successive two (2) year renewal periods (each a &#147;Renewal Term&#148;) upon the same terms and conditions unless &nbsp;either party gives written notice to the other party at least one (1) year prior to the expiration of the Initial Term or any Renewal Term that such party intends not to renew this Agreement, in which case the Agreement will terminate on the last day of the Initial Term or then applicable Renewal Term, as the case may be.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994810"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>10.02</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Termination Upon Certain Events</U></B>. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">In the event that SkyWest or Midwest (i) makes a general assignment for the benefit of creditors or becomes insolvent, (ii) files a voluntary petition in bankruptcy, (iii) petitions for or acquiesces in the appointment of any receiver, trustee or similar officer to liquidate or conserve its business or any substantial part of its assets, (iv) commences under the laws of any competent jurisdiction any proceeding involving its insolvency, bankruptcy, reorganization, readjustment of debt, dissolution, liquidation or any other similar proceeding for the relief of financially distressed debtors, (v) becomes the object of any proceeding or action of the type described in clause (iii) or (iv), above, and such proceeding or action remains undismissed or unstayed for a period of <B>[*] </B>days, or (vi) is divested of a substantial part of its assets for a period of <B>[*] </B>days, then SkyWest (in the event the for
egoing occurs with respect to Midwest) or Midwest (in the event the foregoing occurs with respect to SkyWest) may by written notice terminate this Agreement immediately.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Except as otherwise provided in this Article X, in the event of a breach of a non-monetary provision of this Agreement by either party which remains uncured for <B>[*] </B>days after receipt of written notification of such breach by the non-defaulting party, or in the case of a breach requiring <B>[*] </B>days to cure, the defaulting party does not begin and pursue with due diligence a method of cure within <B>[*] </B>days after receipt of written notification specifying in reasonable detail the nature of such breach from the non-defaulting party, then the non-defaulting party may terminate this Agreement at its sole option.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(c)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">In the event of a breach of a monetary provision of this Agreement by either party which remains uncured for <B>[*] </B>days after receipt of written notification specifying in reasonable detail the nature of such breach from the non-defaulting party, then the non-defaulting party may terminate this Agreement at its sole option.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(d)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">In the event of a breach by SkyWest of any of the Customer Complaints Factor, the Care Check Factor or the Customer Experience Pulse Factor performance standards pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.10, above, for a Performance Period, SkyWest shall immediately take all necessary action to modify its operating procedures in an effort to correct the deficiencies which caused such breach. &nbsp;If, despite such corrective actions, SkyWest breaches the same performance </P>
<P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px"><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>32</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always">standard for the next succeeding Performance Period, Midwest may terminate this Agreement at its sole option upon written notice to SkyWest. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(e)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">In the event the Midwest Guaranty shall fail to remain in full force or effect or any action shall be taken to discontinue or to assert the invalidity or unenforceability of the Midwest Guaranty, or Midwest Air Group, Inc. shall fail to comply with any of the terms or provisions of the Midwest Guaranty, or Midwest Air Group, Inc. denies that it has any further liability under the Midwest Guaranty, or give notice to such effect, SkyWest may terminate this Agreement immediately upon written notice to Midwest.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994811"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>10.03</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Termination by Midwest</U></B>. &nbsp;Notwithstanding the provisions of Section&nbsp;10.02, Midwest shall have the right to terminate this Agreement immediately and at its sole option if:</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">SkyWest shall fail to comply with the provisions of Section&nbsp;9.03 and, as a result thereof, the insurance required thereunder is not in effect.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">SkyWest shall fail to comply with the provisions of Section&nbsp;6.03.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(c)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">More than <B>[*] </B>of the Aircraft do not operate any Scheduled Flights for more than seven (7) consecutive days or <B>[*] </B>of the Aircraft do not operate any Scheduled Flights for more than twenty-one (21) consecutive days, other than as a result of (i) an FAA order which grounds all commercial flights of all air carriers or grounds a specific Aircraft type of all air carriers, (ii) scheduling action by Midwest, or (iii) Midwest&#146;s inability to perform its obligations under this Agreement as a result of a strike by Midwest employees.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(d)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">SkyWest&#146;s FAA or DOT Certification is for any reason suspended or revoked or otherwise not in full force and effect so as to permit SkyWest to perform the Regional Airline Services required under this Agreement.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(e)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">A Prohibited Change in Control shall occur. &nbsp;</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(f)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">SkyWest or any SkyWest Affiliate shall default with respect to the material terms of any other agreement between SkyWest or any SkyWest Affiliate and Midwest or any Midwest Affiliate, and such default shall continue for more than the period of grace, if any, specified therein and shall not have been waived.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(g)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">The SkyWest Guaranty shall fail to remain in full force or effect or any action shall be taken to discontinue or to assert the invalidity or unenforceability of the SkyWest Guaranty, or SkyWest, Inc. shall fail to comply with any of the terms or provisions of the SkyWest Guaranty, or SkyWest, Inc. denies that it has any further liability under the SkyWest Guaranty, or gives notice to such effect.</P>
<P style="margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px" align=center><BR>
<BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin:0px; font-size:16px" align=center>33</P>
<P style="margin:0px"><BR></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; font-size:16px; page-break-before:always" align=center><B>ARTICLE XI<BR>
<BR>
<A NAME="_Toc159994812"></A>MISCELLANEOUS</B></P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994813"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>11.01</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Limitation on Performance</U></B>. &nbsp;The obligation of either Midwest or SkyWest to perform under the terms of this Agreement shall be limited or modified by, and neither party shall be deemed to be in default hereunder as a result of any of the following causes:</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(a)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Acts of God or the public enemy, civil war, insurrections or riots; fires, floods, explosions, embargoes, earthquakes or serious accidents, epidemics, or quarantine restrictions; any act of government, governmental priorities, allocations, orders or Governmental Regulations affecting materials or facilities, inability after due and timely diligence to procure materials, accessories, equipment or parts; or due to any other cause to the extent it is beyond that party&#146;s practical control or not occasioned by that party&#146;s fault or negligence.</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px">(b)</P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px">Cessation, slow-down or interruption of work, or any other labor disturbance involving Midwest.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994814"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>11.02</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Mutual Cooperation</U></B>. &nbsp;Midwest and SkyWest shall use their reasonable best efforts to cooperate with each other in performing their respective obligations under this Agreement.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994815"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>11.03</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Representations and Warranties</U></B>. &nbsp;Except as expressly set forth herein, neither Midwest nor SkyWest shall make any representations or warranties, expressed or implied, under or in connection with this Agreement.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994816"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>11.04</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Assignment</U></B>. &nbsp;This Agreement may not be assigned by any party without the prior written consent of the other party.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994817"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>11.05</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Guaranties</U></B>. &nbsp;Midwest&#146;s obligations under this Agreement are expressly subject to the condition precedent that SkyWest, Inc. execute and deliver to Midwest the SkyWest Guaranty in form and substance satisfactory to Midwest. &nbsp;SkyWest&#146;s obligations under this Agreement are expressly subject to the condition precedent that Midwest Air Group, Inc. execute and deliver the Midwest Guaranty in form and substance satisfactory to SkyWest.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994818"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>11.06</B></P>
<P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:16px; text-indent:96px; font-size:16px"><B><U>Equity Investment</U></B>. &nbsp;Midwest and SkyWest acknowledge that, in conjunction with the negotiation of this Agreement, they and their respective Affiliates have been engaged in discussions regarding a potential investment by SkyWest or one of its Affiliates in certain equity securities of Midwest Air Group, Inc., the parent company of Midwest (the &#147;Equity Investment&#148;). &nbsp;As of the date of execution of this Agreement, the final terms of the Equity Investment have not been finalized. &nbsp;SkyWest covenants and agrees that, if so requested by Midwest, it, or one of its Affiliates acceptable to Midwest, shall make the Equity Investment <B>[*]</B>.</P>
<A NAME="_Toc159994819"></A><P style="line-height:18.667px; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:-18.667px; text-indent:48px; font-size:16px"><B>11.07</B></P>
